dialogue.htmlContent:
TODO You reveal Lunexis's plan to Meraxis. She reacts with surprise and chastises you for having submitted to her in the first place.

lets out a relieves sigh and says that at least she can trust you to never betray her. Says that Ursa must be informed of this, and so to follow her to the Amazon camp.

TODO You follow Meraxis, and are soon standing in Ursa's tent as Meraxis recounts your admission. Ursa shoots you a severe glance, but is relieved in much the same way Meraxis was to see that you'd never betray their trust.

Says that it would be for the best if you were banned from seeing Lunexis again. Whatever power she's been able to exert over you will not be allowed to be harnessed.

Says to Meraxis that she's been wanting to give her a special reward for having helped back in Themiscyra. Seeming to realise what Ursa means, and obviously not wanting to be dominantly fucked by the Amazonian queen, she makes an excuse and teleports back to the tavern.

Ursa sighs that she didn't really have time anyway. Asks you to leave.

TODO You leave the tent. Miraculously, Ursa and Meraxis don't seem to think any less of you, as they seemed more impressed by your honesty than concerned at your initial betrayal.

Letting out a disappointed sigh as you realise that you're not going to be able to get another taste of your Mistress's cock, you continue on your way into the Amazon camp...

TODO You convince Meraxis that there's a secret weapon in Themiscyra, hidden there by Lunexis during the attack on the town. Having now been abandoned by the centauresses, the two of you can travel there and retrieve it.

Meraxis believes you and asks where exactly it is. You say that Lunexis's directions are too vague to pinpoint it, but if you take her along with you, then she can lead the way there.

Meraxis asks if Ursa has been informed of this, to which you say that she's too busy to be involved, and that something like this needs to be acted upon immediately. She is a little hesitant, but says that she'll decide once she's spoken with Lunexis.

TODO You arrive at the Amazons' camp, and recognising both you and Meraxis, are allowed through by Ursa's guards to see Lunexis. Thankfully, the queen is busy with a very important meeting, which lends credence to your assertion that she's too busy to get involved in this matter.

As you enter the sound-proof tent, you see a flash of delight in Lunexis's eyes, but she quickly gets control of herself and takes on the part of the indignant demon. Cursing both you and Meraxis, she says that she's not going to cooperate with anything you want.

You say that you're here about the weapon she mentioned before. Not the sharpest tool in the shed, the centauress is confused, but as you pointedly 'remind her' of the secret weapon she told you about, she finally clocks on and states taht you'll never have it.

Thankfully, Meraxis hasn't noticed Lunexis's odd behaviour, and demands that she reveal the location of this weapon. As Lunexis refuses, Meraxis laughs and says that she's going to lead them to it, or else.

She makes sure one last time with you that it's safe to teleport to Themiscyra. You say that it's safe, but there might be the occasional bandit. You want to get in and out as quickly as possible, so teleport straight to the plaza.

Nodding in approval, the [meraxis.race] summons her energy and begins casting the teleportation spell. A devious smirk settles on Lunexis's face just before you're enveloped by a flash of pinkish purple light...
